question:
Write a letter to the manager of your local bus service. They have recently made some changes to the bus services which created inconveniences for you. In your letter, explain:
Q) What are the changes?
Q) What are the problems you are facing?
Q) What part of the service would you like to change?
text: I regret to write this letter to bring to your notice  the new bus schedule which is causing  inconvenience to the entire public due to the odd time's departure and arrival times.

Having said that, there are regular commuters from my place to the middle of the downtown to perform their duties at their workplace and now due to this change in the schedule everyone is  miserable and  terrified with  their long travels via different sources.

As you heard, we may need to come up with a good transport plan  which is going reduce the travel plan and eventually they feel happy with their travel. In addition, if we have any direct service that is going to offer a smooth ride to them despite the busy schedule at the workplace.
I look forward to seeing the change in the travel schedule and hope it will come soon before it gets worse .
